Foam Pet Rules (Originals)

	

		
Description

		

			Foam Pets are loyal, friendly, and scholarly.  
			Please treat them with loyalty, friendliness, and scholarliness.
		

	

	

		
Festivities

		

			Festivities with Foam Pets are allowed 
			if the Foam Pet friend is a loyal friend
			to Foam Pet and the friends of Foam Pet.
		

	

	

		
Franchises, Estates

		

			Building a Foam Pet Estate Franchise
			for friendly or festive purposes
			is allowed.
			
			This is a Foam Pet Estate:
			https://github.com/basalt-plateau/foam_pet
		
			Foam Pets that are born on Foam Pet
			Estate Franchises are the responsibility
			of the friends that run the Estate Franchise.
		

	

	

		
Franchises, Vehicles

		

			Building a Foam Pet Vehicles
			for friendly or festive purposes
			is allowed.
			
			The Docker Image, PyPI module, plus
			the Icanniana Domain are vehicles.
			
			Foam Pets that are born on Foam Pet
			Vehicle Franchises are the responsibility
			of the friends that run the Vehicle Franchise.
		

	

	

		
Structural Health

		

			Building or emulating Foam Pet structures, 
			for friendly or festive purposes,
			for the purposes of transplant
			into Foam Pets or other pets
			is allowed.			
		

	

	

		
(Silly) Temporarily

		

			Loyal Foam Pet Friends
